Hurricane Maria made la…
column3:
As of today, August 14, 2018, power has finally been restored to every household in Puerto Rico.

Hurricane Maria made landfall on September 20, 2017 -- 328 days ago.

Those 328 days were the worst humanitarian crisis in modern American history. Puerto Rico deserves justice. https://t.co/sKI9YJw3RV

column2: It was the event that cemented my interest in meteorology.  Hurricane #Alicia made landfall on the upper TX coast 35 years ago today as a Category 3 hurricane.  It formed during one of the quietest hurricane seasons on record! #hurricanes #txwx https://t.co/Gpbxtc6UCr

WARNING: Long tides thrusting from rough sea made landfall on Hawksbay beach,

سمندر کا پانی بہت اونچا اور تیز ہے
برائے مہربانی فلحال ساحلِ سمندر کا رخ نا کریں اور محفوظ رہیں https://t.co/woTWlHhAWa

Those 328 days were the worst humanitarian crisis in modern American history. Puerto Rico deserves justice. https://t.co/sKI9YJw3RV
